Package gr.athena.innovation.fagi.core.similarity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cosine
    Class for computing the cosine similarity and cosine distance of two strings.
    Jaccard
    Class providing methods for computing Jaccard Distance and Jaccard Similarity.
    Jaro
    Class providing methods for computing Jaro Similarity and Jaro Distance.
    JaroWinkler  
    Levenshtein
    Class for computing a normalized value for the Levenshtein Distance of two strings.
    LongestCommonSubsequenceMetric
    Class for computing the longest common subsequence.
    NGram
    Class for computing n-gram distance of two strings using the org.apache.lucene.search.spell implementation.
    PermutedJaroWinkler
    A more complex version of the sorted Jaro-Winkler approach.
    SortedJaroWinkler  
    WeightedSimilarity
    Utility class for computing the available distances when using weighted literals.
